:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''AC2100'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2100 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Access Point/Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2100-Dual-Band-Wireless-Gigabit-Access-Point-Range-Extender-ARMOR-X1/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=ZyXEL|kbid=M-02337|model=WAP6806}} *"45-403-000233" is silkscreened on the main board in the [https://fccid.io/I88WAP6806/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3011311 FCC photos]. *"45-601-000512" is silkscreened on the 5GHz wireless module board. :OEM: [[MitraStar]], P/N: WAP6806-EU0101F Web GUI: http://zyxelsetup (Windows) or http://zyxelsetup.local (MAC) ===Serial=== *[https://ewook.fluffis.se/?p=1627 ''ZyXEL Armor X1 (WAP6806)'' on '''eWook'''] {{SCollapse|cpuinfo, meminfo • >> |
